remarks: The units of a subring form a subgroup of the unit group of the original ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
subrgugrp.1 $e |- S = ( R |`s A ) $.
subrgugrp.2 $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
subrgugrp.3 $e |- V = ( Unit ` S ) $.
subrgugrp.4 $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) $.
subrgugrp $p |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> V e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
